title: Watch Turin draw live: Will Alcaraz land in Sinner's group?
description: Fans will be able to watch live as the elite eight players at the Nitto ATP Finals are placed into their four-man groups in Turin on Thursday. A live stream of the draw will be available on nittoatpfinals.com at approximately 12:45 p.m. CET/6:45 a.m. ET. Top seed Jannik Sinner heads the Ilie Nastase group and could find himself matching up with archrival Carlos Alcaraz, who comes into the tournament as World No. 3. New World No. 2 and two-time tournament champion Alexander Zverev heads the John Newcombe group, where he could face 2020 champion Daniil Medvedev. Alcaraz and Medvedev will be randomly drawn into either the Nastase or Newcombe groups. World No. 6 Taylor Fritz and No. 7 Casper Ruud will also find themselves in opposing groups, as will No. 8 Alex de Minaur and No. 9 Andrey Rublev. (World No. 6 Novak Djokovic has withdrawn from the event due to injury.) The doubles field will be split into the Mike Bryan Group and the Bob Bryan Group. [NEWSLETTER FORM]
excerpt: Watch the Turin groups be made Thursday 7 November at approx. 12:45 p.m. CET/6.45 am ET at the official tournament website.
text: Nitto ATP Finals Draw to begin at approximately 12.45 p.m CET/6.45 a.m. ET on Thursday 7 November  November 06, 2024 ATP Tour The live draw for the 2024 Nitto ATP Finals will begin at approximately 12.45 p.m. CET on Thursday 7 November. A live stream of the draw will be available on nittoatpfinals.com at approximately 12:45 p.m. CET/6:45 a.m. ET. Top seed Jannik Sinner heads the Ilie Nastase group and could find himself matching up with archrival Carlos Alcaraz, who comes into the tournament as World No. 3. New World No. 2 and two-time tournament champion Alexander Zverev heads the John Newcombe group, where he could face 2020 champion Daniil Medvedev. Alcaraz and Medvedev will be randomly drawn into either the Nastase or Newcombe groups. World No. 6 Taylor Fritz and No. 7 Casper Ruud will also find themselves in opposing groups, as will No. 8 Alex de Minaur and No. 9 Andrey Rublev. (World No. 6 Novak Djokovic has withdrawn from the event due to injury.) The doubles field will be split into the Mike Bryan Group and the Bob Bryan Group.
html:
Nitto ATP Finals

Draw to begin at approximately 12.45 p.m CET/6.45 a.m. ET on Thursday 7 November 

November 06, 2024

ATP Tour

The live draw for the 2024 Nitto ATP Finals will begin at approximately 12.45 p.m. CET on Thursday 7 November. By ATP Staff

Fans will be able to watch live as the elite eight players at the Nitto ATP Finals are placed into their four-man groups in Turin on Thursday. A live stream of the draw will be available on nittoatpfinals.com at approximately 12:45 p.m. CET/6:45 a.m. ET.

Top seed Jannik Sinner heads the Ilie Nastase group and could find himself matching up with archrival Carlos Alcaraz, who comes into the tournament as World No. 3. New World No. 2 and two-time tournament champion Alexander Zverev heads the John Newcombe group, where he could face 2020 champion Daniil Medvedev.

Alcaraz and Medvedev will be randomly drawn into either the Nastase or Newcombe groups. World No. 6 Taylor Fritz and No. 7 Casper Ruud will also find themselves in opposing groups, as will No. 8 Alex de Minaur and No. 9 Andrey Rublev. (World No. 6 Novak Djokovic has withdrawn from the event due to injury.)

The doubles field will be split into the Mike Bryan Group and the Bob Bryan Group.
